sentences.cn: 自成体系的成人教育机构

sentences.en: All adult dogs are routinely wormed at least every six months.
sentences.cn: 所有的成年狗至少每半年要例行打一次虫。

sentences.en: All adult males will be liable for conscription.
sentences.cn: 所有成年男子都有义务应征入伍。

sentences.en: Anyone over eighteen years of age counts as adult.
sentences.cn: 凡是超过18岁的都算成年人.

sentences.en: Children must be accompanied by an adult.
sentences.cn: 儿童必须要有大人陪同。

sentences.en: Children unaccompanied by an adult will not be admitted.
sentences.cn: 儿童无成年人陪伴着不准入场.

sentences.en: He lived most of his adult life in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 他成年后大部分时间住在苏格兰。

sentences.en: I tried to understand the adult world and could not.
sentences.cn: 我试着去了解成人世界，却无法猜透。

sentences.en: Most adult education centres offer computing courses.
sentences.cn: 大多数成教中心都设有计算机课程。

sentences.en: Over one-quarter of the adult population are not fully literate.
sentences.cn: 四分之一以上的成年人不具备完全的读写能力。

sentences.en: She is taller than I imagined, more adult, more intense.
sentences.cn: 她比我想象的更高、更成熟、更热切。

sentences.en: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子觉得与大人很难谈得来。

sentences.en: The adult to child ratio is 1 to 6.
sentences.cn: 成人与儿童的比例为1比6。

sentences.en: The average adult man burns 1,500 to 2,000 calories per day.
sentences.cn: 普通成年男子每天消耗的热量为1,500到2,000卡路里。

sentences.en: They're separated from the adult inmates.
sentences.cn: 他们同成年犯分开关押。

sentences.en: We should do our best to develop the adult education.
sentences.cn: 我们应当努力发展成人教育.

sentences.en: Which adult in these children's lives will provide the nurturing they need?
sentences.cn: 这些孩子生活中的哪个成人会为他们提供所需的养育呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 成人学校；成人进修学校

trans.tran_cn: 成年的，成熟的，（因涉及色情或暴力）仅限于成人的

trans.tran_en: a fully-grown person, or one who is considered to be legally responsible for their actions
